Windlord:

Windlord did that Grounded said, he flew around keeping his distance 
of red mist and starting shot agaisnt Wildrider (25 shot )


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded saw the shots fly by and took a second to react..."Friend
> please drop me out and commense battle with this enemy...I will get
> him when he is distracted.  He then opened his links to his
> dandilions...scan ...scan...THERE...
> HE directed his roses toward the flying bot and a mist started
> sparying out. A highly energon filled mist that would overdose the
> enemy bot and put him into standby if the bot flew through the thick
> red mist.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Wildrider looks at Winlord try to leave, "Nuh unhhhh, that's not 
very
> > brave" he whispered, and then started to cackle very loudly. He 
swooped
> > downwards, spreading his legs, and he pulled out his 
Scatterblaster,
> > pulling the trigger three times, sending a barrage of laser fire 
towards
> > Winlord.
